tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ClientInteractions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  interaction_date DATE,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  communication_method VARCHAR(50),
  notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE clients (
	client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	first_name VARCHAR(50),
	last_name VARCHAR(50),
	email VARCHAR(100),
	phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
	interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	client_id INT,
	interaction_date DATE,
	interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
	notes TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES clients(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ClientInteractions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ClientCommunications (
  communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  communication_date TIMESTAMP,
  communication_type VARCHAR(50),
  communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  interaction_date DATE,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Clients(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Communications (
  communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  communication_date DATE,
  communication_type VARCHAR(50),
  message TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Clients(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE clients (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(255),
    client_email VARCHAR(255),
    client_phone VARCHAR(20),
    client_address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    communication_date DATE,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50),
    communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE advisors (
    advisor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    advisor_name VARCHAR(255),
    advisor_email VARCHAR(255),
    advisor_phone VARCHAR(20),
    advisor_specialty VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE meetings (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    advisor_id INT,
    meeting_date DATE,
    meeting_type VARCHAR(50),
    meeting_notes TEXT
);
